summary.para: Indicates the behavior of a live source filter.

remarks.para: If no flags are set (the default case), the source filter is assumed to be live and not to perform any rate matching on its own.

summary.para: The filter uses its own rate-matching mechanism; the renderer should therefore not attempt to match rates with this filter.
The filter is not live. Do not treat it as a live source, even though it exposes the interface.
The filter time stamps the samples using a private clock. The clock is not available to the rest of the graph through .
